name: ZipForm File
summary: Learn about .ZFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: While ZipForm uses the proprietary ZFX format, users generate ZipForm documents in .PDF format more commonly.

description: File created by ZipForm, a program used to facilitate real estate transactions online; contains real estate forms and other documentation; used for sending real estate information over email.
